name: MoonFlower (boff.victor)
description:
Keyboard Arrows: Move the Character

Space Bar: Pass the level

This game was made in GameMaker, it took just one day to make the eight stages present in it.

Hope you like it. In it there is the presence of RGB and CMYK color combination, which is a clue for a future big project that I will do.

Note: do not click on the spacebar in the last stage I didn't make the Sprites, I don't take credit for them, just the mechanics and the scenarios
